name: Pandemic Hero
description:
All doctors and scientists from the whole world disappeared after an invasion of evil creatures, which have spreaded a virus across the earth, infecting all humanity and threatening its survival. You are the very last medical student that can save the world, by providing a vaccine. 

And now it’s your best and last chance! You just found a the last dose of vaccine that was lost by a group of scientists just before they got eliminated. Now it is your duty to escape from the angry of the evil creatures and run for a safer place. RUN!
____________________________________________________________________________________

The game is an infinte runner in which you are a doctor that must jump from building to building of a apocalyptic city, besdies dodging giant virus and enemies that will try to hurt you. You also can throw some medicine pills in the enemies to eliminate them.

_____________________________________________________________________________________

This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2021.
